pli-tv-pvr16:8.1: [Sp.5.404](): _Payogassāti cīvaradhovanādino sattavidhassa pubbakaraṇassatthāya yo udakāharaṇādiko payogo kayirati, tassa payogassa_, “_Payogassa_: the effort of fetching water, etc., done for the sake of the seven-fold prior actions, beginning with washing the robe: for that effort.”
pli-tv-pvr16:8.7: [Sp.5.404](): _Vatthussāti saṅghāṭiādino kathinavatthussa_, “_Vatthussa_: the basis/object of the robe-making ceremony, which is the upper robe, etc.”
pli-tv-pvr16:21.2: [Sp.5.408](): _Kiriyā majjheti paccuddhāro ceva adhiṭṭhānañca_, “_Kiriyā majjhe_: just relinquishing and determining.”
